::Halucigen::
Halucigen neared the base in Syria and his scorpion tail fired a 
stream of corrosive acid that could burn through concrete. I made a 
small hole aboutthe size of an orange that the small scorpion ran 
through and into the base.  

OOC:If this is moding for the Destron base can whoever is in cahrge 
of the base reply as to what my acid did.....thanx....
